propDescriptions.active: Sets the step as active. Is passed to child components.
propDescriptions.classes: Override or extend the styles applied to the component. See CSS API below for more details.
propDescriptions.completed: Mark the step as completed. Is passed to child components.
propDescriptions.component: The component used for the root node. Either a string to use a HTML element or a component.
propDescriptions.disabled: If true, the step is disabled, will also disable the button if StepButton is a child of Step. Is passed to child components.
propDescriptions.index: The position of the step. The prop defaults to the value inherited from the parent Stepper component.
propDescriptions.last: If true, the Step is displayed as rendered last. The prop defaults to the value inherited from the parent Stepper component.
propDescriptions.sx: The system prop that allows defining system overrides as well as additional CSS styles. See the `sx` page for more details.

root.description: Styles applied to the root element.
